item.title: Let's blog
item.description:
Hi! My name is Guilherme Ferreira. I'm a Portuguese software developer, mostly connected to the web development and to the .net Framework, living in the beautiful city of Porto. Go check the pictures, I will be right here waiting for you.

I'm starting this blog with the intent to share the lessons that I learn, write news about my work and to improve my English writing skills.
item.a10:content:
Hi! My name is Guilherme Ferreira. I'm a Portuguese software developer, mostly connected to the web development and to the .net Framework, living in the beautiful city of Porto. Go check the pictures, I will be right here waiting for you.

I'm starting this blog with the intent to share the lessons that I learn, write news about my work and to improve my English writing skills. Following this page you can expect to read cool stuff about software development, entrepreneurship, productivity tips and other living stuff.

Go subscribe the RSS feed, visit the about page to find my contacts and feel free to contact me.

I'll see you soon... and now let's blog!
